Name: Alpha Version Prototype
Description:
September 2012 release to meet project milestone for alpha version prototype release. 

Milestones for release:

*	Utility Function Result Display / Interface

**		Create toolbar
*	Save a polygon	
*	Load a WFS layer	
*	Load a polygon

*	Get the distance to a point from a polygon	
*	Get the area of a polygon	
*	Find/Identify Attributes of a Point	
*	Find a GIS server to post our own data to	
*	Add points via a Icon Toolbar	
*	Add a new layer that lets the user draw lines	
!! Data & Coverages

*	Social Data	
*	Slope Data	
*	Site Specific Data	
*	Find the Data (Randy will find the services)	
*	Base Maps

!! Conduct Research		
*	Evaluate the use of EXTjs vs jQuery for the building of the UI	
!! Architecture

*	Create the Add Site tool
